abstract.para: This guide provides installation and usage instructions for the new Interchange catalog called "&WW;".
The &WW; catalog is intended to be used as a base for production websites in &IC;, and places emphasis on usefulness out of the box, clarity, modern HTML & CSS, and ease of customization.
